metadata.title: CVE-2021-32850 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: jQuery MiniColors is a color picker built on jQuery. Prior to version 2.3.6, jQuery MiniColors is prone to cross-site scripting when handling untrusted color names. This issue is patched in version 2.3.6.

criterions.comment: jquery-minicolors package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
